title: VH1 Best Week Ever Font
content:
This is from the VH1 TV show, Best Week Ever. It would be great if someone could tell me what font was used.  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Best Week Ever.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201223124/http:/typophile.com/files/Best%20Week%20Ever.jpg) | 6 KB |

 [‹ Looking for the "Golden Compass"/Panera Bread font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201223124/http:/typophile.com/node/39620 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type Ident. for 'Color After Klein' book ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201223124/http:/typophile.com/node/39606 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sarulacs

comments.content:
It looks like ’T H Alphabet Soup’, and old VGC font, sold once by Image Club.

- Mike Yanega

Apparently Red Rooster now sells [Alphabet Soup](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201223124/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/alphabet-soup/).

- Mike Yanega
